TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that user is able to run 'User Defined Report'.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click 'Crash' tab.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click 'Crash' tab.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click 'Crash' tab.

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Drag and drop Severity of Crash field to rows section.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to drag and drop Severity of Crash field to rows section.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to drag and drop Severity of Crash field to rows section.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to drag and drop Severity of Crash field to rows section.

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Drag and drop Collision Type field to rows section.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to drag and drop Collision Type field to rows section.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to drag and drop Collision Type field to rows section.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to drag and drop Collision Type field to rows section.

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Drag and drop Crash Date field to columns section.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to drag and drop Crash Date field to columns section.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to drag and drop Crash Date field to columns section.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to drag and drop Crash Date field to columns section.

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Drag and drop No of Vehicles field to columns section.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to drag and drop No of Vehicles field to columns section.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to drag and drop No of Vehicles field to columns section.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to drag and drop No of Vehicles field to columns section.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on run button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on run button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on run button.
